name: 100 Doors Classic: Escape Room
description:
We present you a new addicting puzzle game in “100 doors” genre!
It contains a lot of new interesting puzzles for all niche lovers.
Your goal is simple - find and use hidden objects and solve the puzzle.
Use all potential of your mind to unlock the door and escape the room!

Features:
- tons of addictive puzzles;
- great graphics and uniquely designed rooms;
- a lot of new rooms in frequent updates;
- the game is free and always will be.

How to play:
- open the door to escape room;
- use abilities of your device such as tilt, shake, swipe, tap to solve the puzzles;
- find and use items.

Can you escape all 100 rooms?

If you're having any problems or questions feel free to contact us at support@ninjapublishing.com
Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ninjapublishing/
